name: Frog Run (johnbrynte)
description:
You are a frog on the run and there is only one way to go - forward! Jump your way past roads and rivers before the time runs out. Beware of jumping too far or you might just end up in the river!

Made in Godot 4.0 Alpha. Textures done in Photoshop. 3D models done in Blender. Music done in FL Studio.

Controls

Jump with SPACE. The longer you press the further you jump.

Reset with R.

Sound credits

splashes/splash11.wav, Rocktopus (https://freesound.org/people/Rocktopus/sounds/233412/)
